009package imagingbook.common.geometry.ellipse;
010
011import static imagingbook.common.math.Arithmetic.sqr;
012import static imagingbook.common.math.Matrix.multiply;
013import static imagingbook.common.math.Matrix.normL2;
014import static java.lang.Math.cos;
015import static java.lang.Math.sin;
016
017import java.util.Locale;
018
019import imagingbook.common.geometry.basic.Pnt2d;
020import imagingbook.common.math.Matrix;
021import imagingbook.common.math.PrintPrecision;
022
023public class AlgebraicEllipse implements Ellipse {
024        
025        /**
026         * Represents an algebraic ellipse of the form
027         * A x^2 + B xy + C y^2 + D x + E y + F = 0
028         * 
029         * @author WB
030         */
031        
032        public final double A, B, C, D, E, F;
033        
034        public AlgebraicEllipse(double A, double B, double C, double D, double E, double F) {
035                this(new double[] {A, B, C, D, E, F});
036        }
037        
038        public AlgebraicEllipse(double[] p) {
039                p = Matrix.normalize(p);
040                A = p[0];
041                B = p[1];
042                C = p[2];
043                D = p[3];
044                E = p[4];
045                F = p[5];
046        }
047        
048        public static AlgebraicEllipse from(double[] p) {
049                return (p == null) ? null : new AlgebraicEllipse(p);
050        }
051        
052        @Override
053        public double[] getParameters() {
054                return new double[] {A, B, C, D, E, F};
055        }
056        
057        public static AlgebraicEllipse from(GeometricEllipse ell) {
058                double ra = ell.ra;
059                double rb = ell.rb;
060                double xc = ell.xc;
061                double yc = ell.yc;
062                double theta = ell.theta;
063                
064                double cosT = cos(theta);
065                double sinT = sin(theta);
066                
067                double A = sqr(ra * sinT) + sqr(rb * cosT);
068                double B = 2 * (sqr(rb) - sqr(ra)) * sinT * cosT;
069                double C = sqr(ra * cosT) + sqr(rb * sinT);
070                double D = -2 * A * xc - B * yc;
071                double E = -2 * C * yc - B * xc;
072                double F = A * sqr(xc) + B * xc * yc + C * sqr(yc) - sqr(ra * rb);
073                
074                return new AlgebraicEllipse(A, B, C, D, E, F);
075        }
076        
077        public double getAlgebraicDistance(Pnt2d p) {
078                double x = p.getX();
079                double y = p.getY();
080
081//              double s = 1.0 / Math.sqrt(4*A*C - sqr(B));
082//              double s = 1.0 / (4*A*C - sqr(B));
083                return A * sqr(x) + B * x * y + C * sqr(y) + D * x + E * y + F;
084//              double a = s * A;
085//              double b = s * B;
086//              double c = s * C;
087//              double d = s * D;
088//              double e = s * E;
089//              double f = s * F;
090                
091//              System.out.println("norm = " + (4*a*c - sqr(b)));
092//              return a * sqr(x) + b * x * y + c * sqr(y) + d * x + e * y + f;
093        }
094        
095        
096//      public double getSampsonDistance1(Pnt2d p) {
097//              double x = p.getX();
098//              double y = p.getY();
099//              double da = A * sqr(x) + B * x * y + C * sqr(y) + D * x + E * y + F;    // algebraic distance
100//              double s = 2 * sqrt(sqr(A*x + B*y/2 + D) + sqr(B*x/2 + C*y + F));
101//              return Math.abs(da) / s;
102//      }
103        
104//      public double getSampsonDistance2(Pnt2d p) {
105//              double x = p.getX();
106//              double y = p.getY();
107//              double da = A*sqr(x) + B*x*y + C*sqr(y) + D*x + E*y + F;        // algebraic distance
108//              System.out.println("   da = " + da);
109//              double s = 4 * (sqr(A*x + B*y/2 + D) + sqr(B*x/2 + C*y + F));
110//              return sqr(da) / s;
111//      }
112        
113        
114        public double getSampsonDistance(Pnt2d p) {
115                double x = p.getX();
116                double y = p.getY();
117                double ad = A * sqr(x) + B * x * y + C * sqr(y) + D * x + E * y + F;    // algebraic distance
118//              System.out.println("   ad = " + ad);
119                
120//              RealVector J = Matrix.makeRealVector(2*A*x + B*y + D, B*x + 2*C*y + E);
121//              System.out.println("J = " + Matrix.toString(J));
122//              double nJ = J.getNorm();
123                
124                // norm of gradient of da at (x,y)
125                double nGrad = Math.hypot(2*A*x + B*y + D, 2*C*y + B*x + E);
126//              System.out.println("nJ = " + nJ);
127                return ad / nGrad;
128        }
129        
130        public double getGoncharovaDistance(Pnt2d p) {
131                double x = p.getX();
132                double y = p.getY();
133                double G = A * sqr(x) + B * x * y + C * sqr(y) + D * x + E * y + F;     // algebraic distance
134                
135                double[] gV = {2*A*x + B*y + D, 2*C*y + B*x + E};
136                double ngV = normL2(gV);
137                double sd = G / ngV;
138                
139                double[][] H = {{ 2*A, B }, { B, 2*C }};
140                double gd = sd * (1 + G * Matrix.dotProduct(multiply(gV, H), gV) / (2 * Math.pow(ngV, 4)));
141                
142                return gd;
143        }
144        
145        
146        // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
147        
148        
149        @Override
150        public String toString() {
151                return String.format(Locale.US, "%s %s", 
152                                this.getClass().getSimpleName(), 
153                                Matrix.toString(getParameters()));
154        }
155        
156        // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
157        
158        public static void main(String[] args) {
159                PrintPrecision.set(9);
160                GeometricEllipse eg  = new GeometricEllipse(150, 50, 150, 150, 0.5);
161                System.out.println("eg = " + eg);
162                AlgebraicEllipse ea = AlgebraicEllipse.from(eg);
163                System.out.println("ea = " + ea);
164                
165                Pnt2d p = Pnt2d.from(300, 300);
166                System.out.println("p  = " + p);
167                Pnt2d pc = eg.getClosestPoint(p);
168                System.out.println("pc = " + pc);
169                
170//              System.out.println("Sampson dist1(p) = " + ea.getSampsonDistance1(p));
171//              System.out.println("Sampson dist2(p) = " + ea.getSampsonDistance2(p));
172                System.out.println("Sampson distS(p) = " + ea.getSampsonDistance(p));
173                System.out.println("Gonch distS(p) = " + ea.getGoncharovaDistance(p));
174                
175        }
176
177}
